job_history.work_description: Oversight of documentation and file organization. Level Designer, including enemy, items, and basic layout. Co-Designer for general game mechanics.
Served as mentor to junior team members. Filled out daily paperwork; inventory logs, staff time logs, etc. Oversight of multiple concession stands serving a variety of items.
Prepared food items and cooked on a grill or in fryers. Carefully maintained sanitation, health and safety standards in all work areas. Performed general maintenance duties.

Prepared items according to written or verbal orders while performing extensive multitasking. Cleaned food preparation areas, cooking surfaces, and utensils. Closely followed standard protocols for safe food preparation, assembly, and presentation to ensure customer satisfaction.

skills.name: Game Design
skills.explanation: Worked as a Game Design Intern, including level design and co-designing game mechanics, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Served as a mentor to junior team members and had oversight of multiple concession stands, indicating some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Handled multiple tasks and responsibilities in various roles, including concessions supervision and food service, showing a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Worked in team environments, including as a concessions supervisor and game design intern, indicating a solid working proficiency in teamwork.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Handled various tasks and responsibilities, including inventory management and staff time logs, showing some practical experience in problem-solving.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Interacted with customers and team members in various roles, including customer service representative and concessions supervisor, indicating some practical experience in communication.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Had some experience with project management as a concessions supervisor, but it's not a primary skill, indicating basic familiarity.

skills.name: Computer Science
skills.explanation: Earned a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, suggesting strong proficiency in the field.
